remarks: Re-index a finite group sum using a bijection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 2-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
gsumzcl.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzcl.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzf1o.h $e |- ( ph -> H : C -1-1-onto-> A ) $.
gsumzf1o $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) = ( G gsum ( F o. H ) ) ) $.
